channel.title: Seasonal-Cycles on Bishop's Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Seasonal-Cycles on Bishop's Corner

item.title: Master the Quartely Clock
item.author: james (James Mwangi Kamau)
item.description: Learn how to apply seasonal planning principles—inspired by natural cycles and timeless wisdom—to fortify your cybersecurity operations. By breaking the year into actionable quarters, you can proactively address vulnerabilities, allocate resources strategically, and ensure resilience against both predictable and unforeseen threats.
